original_text: And when he had lifted him and brought him to his mother, the child sat on her lap till noon, and then he died.
korean_text: 곧 어머니에게로 데려갔더니 낮까지 어머니의 무릎에 앉아 있다가 죽은지라

sentences.original_text: And when he had lifted him
and brought him to his mother,
the child sat on her lap till noon,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 아이가 정오까지 그의 무릎에 앉아 있다가
